channel.title: SkyLearn Combined Pre-Filter Test Feed
channel.description: Mixed feed to validate keyword-based property relocation filtering

item.title: Landsec relocates headquarters to new London Bridge office
item.description: Landsec has moved into a 180,000 sq ft headquarters on Tooley Street, consolidating its existing West End offices.

item.title: Netflix renews hit drama for final season after fan campaign
item.description: The streaming giant confirmed production will begin early next year, ending months of speculation.

item.title: Brookfield signs major lease with global law firm at City tower
item.description: Brookfield Properties has secured a 15-year lease with a leading international law firm at 100 Bishopsgate.

item.title: Harry Styles spotted at London restaurant with mystery guest
item.description: The pop star was seen dining at Soho House amid rumours of a new album announcement.

item.title: Google expands UK footprint with new Manchester office space
item.description: Google has signed a pre-let for 90,000 sq ft at Circle Square, planning to relocate 2,000 staff from Birmingham.

item.title: Love Island star launches new skincare line
item.description: Former contestant announces cruelty-free brand in partnership with Boots UK.

item.title: Meta opens new European headquarters in Dublin docklands
item.description: Meta has officially opened its new 450,000 sq ft HQ, consolidating three existing offices into one location.

item.title: Kim Kardashian announces new season of Keeping Up With the Kardashians
item.description: The reality TV star confirmed production will begin next spring with streaming set for late 2026.

item.title: Barclays consolidates London offices with move to Canary Wharf campus
item.description: Barclays will relocate staff from four separate offices into a single 300,000 sq ft building at One Churchill Place.

item.title: Manchester United star launches fashion collaboration with Adidas
item.description: The collection features limited-edition trainers and streetwear inspired by his Manchester roots.
